recipesJson.name: Mega Man Yogurt, by VaporAlchemist
recipesJson.author: DataNotAnecdotes
recipesJson.description:
"A creamy Vanilla Yogurt with fresh and tart Blueberries, topped with crispy Granola."

If you're wanting to drop the VBIC and Sweetener, increase Blueberry Extra to 6 and Cheesecake to 4.5

reviews.text: It's a super thick vape and sweet vape, and I've enjoyed it immensely since last july. Thanks for reposting here.
